title.rendered: Rehlat offers / Najim card holders get up to AED 300 flat discount on flight bookings

content.rendered:
Najm Cardholders receive a flat discount of up to AED 300 on flight bookings booked with www.rehlat.ae

The offer is valid from 15 th February 2020 to 31 st March 2020.

Coupon Code: REHNAJM

Book your flight tickets with Rehlat and Enjoy great discount using your Najm card

Terms and conditions:

  • Offer is valid for booking from 15th February 2020 until 31st March 2020.
  • Travel and stay validity are open.
  • Discount on flight is applied on the total fare.
  • The flight offer is applicable on all international flights except flights of Jazeera Airways, SpiceJet , flydubai , flynas, Air Arabia, IndiGo, GoAir, Pegasus, SalamAir, Wataniya Airways, Cebu Pacific, Onur Air, flyadeal, Air India Express, Air Arabia Egypt, Air Arabia Maroc.
  • Flight offer is valid on all international flights. Applicable on one-way, round trip and multi city trips.
  • The discount on hotel booking is applicable on total booking value.
  • Offer is valid on only 3 transactions per customer for each flight and hotel booking.
  • This offer is not valid in conjunction with any other deals or promotions.
  • Discount is applicable only when paid with a valid Najm credit card.
  • The coupon code is valid on Rehlat site & App.
  • Standard terms and conditions and fare rules will continue to apply – please read the fare conditions online at the time of purchase as fare rules vary by ticket and destination.
  • Special fares are part of marketing promotions by Rehlat and are subject to change without prior notice.
  • Majid Al Futtaim Finance LLC & merchant terms & conditions apply.
  • Majid Al Futtaim Finance LLC reserves the right to terminate the offer without any prior notice.
